system.description:
A spell to cause a beam of blinding, burning light to issue from the casterâ€™s hand at a specific target within CSI hexes. The beam acts as a High Velocity (Dodge 50%) missile weapon with Fire impact of:

MS: CSI +1d6

CS: CSI +3d6

 

The beam will be refracted/reflected as would ordinary light, and may be weakened or eliminated by darkness spells, etc. Armour and clothing reduce fire impact as normal.

 

Bonus Effects

CML60+Beam may originate from a Lyahvi elemental object within CSI hexes, line of sight.

 

Time: 15-CSI seconds

Range: CSI hexes

Duration: None
